mainChat

Interface ViewInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    View

    public interface ViewInterface
    The view interface for define a GUI for a chat. The class that is interested to developing a GUI for a chat implements this interface
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino, Stefano Belli
